title: Initial Contact Call
description: Reached out to discuss their requirements for the new CRM system. They seem very interested.

title: Proposal Sent
description: Sent detailed proposal with pricing and timeline information.

title: Product Demo
description: Conducted live demo of the CRM platform. Client was impressed with the features.
outcome: Very positive - moving to negotiation phase

title: Prepare Contract
description: Draft and review contract documents for the new client.

title: Client Preferences
description: Client prefers cloud-based solution and wants integration with their existing accounting software.

title: Follow-up Call
description: Checked in on their decision timeline and answered additional questions.
outcome: Decision expected by end of week

title: Technical Assessment
description: Evaluate technical requirements and infrastructure needs.

title: Implementation Timeline
description: Shared detailed implementation timeline and milestone schedule.
